# Jonathan's story {#jonathan}

Meet Jonathan Cowling, see figure \@ref(fig:jonathan-fig) he graduated with a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science with Industrial Experience in 2020, with this episode being recorded two years later in 2022. Jonathan spent a year in industry working at [MoneySuperMarket.com](https://www.moneysupermarket.com/), before moving to [infinityworks.com](https://www.infinityworks.com/) as a graduate and then onto [equalexperts.com](https://www.equalexperts.com/).

```{r jonathan-fig, echo = FALSE, fig.align = "center", out.width = "100%", fig.cap = "(ref:captionjonathan)"}
knitr::include_graphics("images/jonathan.jpeg")
```
